citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 8/9/16 at 4:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Inspector honked GOV horn and called telephone numbers given by the licensee. Licensee stated that they had
a prior scheduled medical appointment and would not be available to do a facility inspection.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 8/9/16 at  4:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
*   Inspector honked GOV horn and called telephone numbers given by the licensee.   Licensee stated that they had
a prior scheduled medical appointment and would not be available to do a facility inspection.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
